nodes.text: Renegade was a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport used by Imperial forces during the Galactic Civil War. The Renegade took part on the first skirmish on Deep Space Manufacturing Facility ZA-13. It was used to reload the TIE Defenders with warheads when they run out and needed to reload.
The Renegade is a transport ship that appears in Star Wars:TIE Fighter at Battle 8 Combat 2. When the player runs out of missiles, the Renegade will appear to reload your craft.
